content: {"name": "MDHHS- Wayne County SNAP Assistance (Detroit)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\"https://newmibridges.michigan.gov/s/isd-landing-page?language=en_US\nHave questions about your benefits or your case? Contact your case worker or local office. You can find the list of local MDHHS offices: https://mdhhs.michigan.gov/CompositeDirPub/CountyCompositeDirectory.aspx", "email": "", "url": "https://www.michigan.gov/mdhhs/inside-mdhhs/county-offices/wayne/south-central-children-family-services", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1801 East Canfield Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Forest Park", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48207", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3593105, "longitude": -83.0454687}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 456-1000", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "SNAP assistance available"}]}
